author: Cape Cod Times sports@capecodonline.com
title: Running
text: Posted Oct. 6, 2015 at 9:44 PM By Cape Cod Times Posted Oct. 6, 2015 at 9:44 PM » Social News RUNNING High Five 5K , 10 a.m. Saturday, Seafood Sam’s, 6 Coast Guard Road, Sandwich, highfive5k.com . Clam Crawl , over-sand 3K and 6K, noon Saturday, Sandy Neck Beach Park, 425 Sandy Neck Road, West Barnstable, active.com . Nantucket Half-Marathon , 8 a.m. Sunday, Nantucket Lighthouse School, 1 Rugged Road, nantuckethalfmarathon.com . Yarmouth Seaside Festival 5K , 9 a.m. Sunday, Laurence Mac Arthur Elementary School, 1175 Route 28, South Yarmouth, runsignup.com/Race/MA/SouthYarmouth . Robert Stone Memorial 5K , 11 a.m. Monday, West Dennis Beach, Davis Beach Road, active.com . The Nun Run 5K , 9 a.m. Oct. 17, Red Nun, 746 Main St., Chatham, chathamnunrun.com . InesCAPEable Zombie 5K , 5 p.m. Oct. 17, Cape Cod Fairgrounds, 1220 Nathan Ellis Highway, East Falmouth, runsignup.com/Race/MA/EastFalmouth/InescapableZombieRun . Miles for Meghan 5K run/walk , 11 a.m. Oct. 17, School and Main streets, Cotuit, benefits cystic fibrosis, includes youth races, semcsports.com . Wellfleet Recreation Shuck & Run Oyster Festival 5K , 9 a.m. Oct. 18, Wellfleet, active.com . Cape Cod Marathon & Relay , 8:30 a.m. Oct. 25, Falmouth Village Green, capecodmarathon.com . Dennis Police 5K Halloween Hustle , 11 a.m. Oct. 25, Mayflower Beach, Dunes Road, Dennis, dennispolice5k.org . Screech at the Beach 5K , 11 a.m. Oct. 31, Raw Bar, Popponesset Marketplace, New Seabury, kids fun run 10:30 a.m., runreg.com/screech-at-the-beach-5k . Falmouth in the Fall Road Race , 7 miles, 1 p.m. Nov. 1, Woods Hole, falmouthinthefall.org . Barnstable Education Foundation’s Run for Success , 5K run/walk, 10 a.m. Nov. 14, Centerville Elementary School, 658 Bay Lane, includes youth races, semcsports.com . Edaville Rail Run , 5-mile trail race and 2-mile fun run, 10 a.m. Nov. 14, South Carver, edavillerailrun.com . Chatham Turkey Trot 5K, 8 a.m. Nov. 26, parking lot behind Chatham Orpheum Theater, Main Street and Stage Harbor Road, chathamturkeytrot.com . Run Your Turkey Off 5K , 9 a.m. Nov. 28, Bourne High School, 75 Waterhouse Road, southshoreracemgmt.com . Andrea Holden Thanksgiving Race, 5K , 10 a.m. Nov. 28, Dennis Inn, Scarsdale Road, Dennis, andreaholden.org . Race information may be emailed to seastman@capecodonline.com By Cape Cod Times
